items: Technical support across the Mediterranean coast

hero.title: We upgrade your vessel with smart electronic solutions and a dedicated technical crew.
hero.description: From design to commissioning, we support shipowners, shipyards and professionals to ensure safe, efficient and connected navigation all year round.

plan.title: 360° full service plan
plan.description: Audit, installation, training and ongoing maintenance with tailored reports for every vessel.

stats.label: Years of combined experience in our technical team
Average response time for emergency services

solutions.title: We integrate leading technology for every type of vessel
solutions.description: We partner with top manufacturers to deploy robust systems that enhance safety, comfort and energy efficiency for leisure and professional fleets alike.

items.title: Navigation systems
items.description: Installation and upkeep of radars, autopilots, electronic charts and next-generation sensors.

items.title: Marine communications
items.description: End-to-end radio, satellite, AIS and data network solutions for reliable offshore connectivity.

items.title: Power and control
items.description: Electrical panels, smart batteries and monitoring systems that optimise onboard energy performance.

services.title: We manage the full lifecycle of your electronic equipment
services.description: We coordinate turnkey projects: design, certified installation, calibration, onboard training and preventive support to avoid unexpected downtime.

items.title: Expert consulting
items.description: Specialised engineers who tailor every project to the needs of each vessel.

items.title: End-to-end integrations
items.description: We coordinate multi-brand equipment to deliver a seamless navigation experience.

items.title: 24/7 support
items.description: Always-on technical service to solve issues quickly in any harbour.

cta.title: Schedule a technical visit or request an onboard demo
cta.description: Tell us what you need and we will prepare a tailored proposal for your vessel or fleet. We operate from Valencia, Alicante, the Balearic Islands and Barcelona.

footer.description: Specialists in marine electronics and telecommunications since 1998.
